plot: This documentary shows life in Lesotho, life where there is 1 doctor to every 10,000 people. Patients have to walk days of traveling just to get to the medical facility, only wait even more days before they can be treated.
title: Mountains of Hope
plot_es: This documentary shows life in Lesotho, life where there is 1 doctor to every 10,000 people. Patients have to walk days of traveling just to get to the medical facility, only wait even more days before they can be treated.
